Text.Page:
How dare those twisted monstrosities call themselves "Blood Guards"â€”it sickens me.

Every time I see them pretend to be real soldiers, I die a little inside. They're monsters!

, show them what a real soldier looks like. Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:33#12#Blood Guard lancers} and {@LinkCreature:33#62#champions}, and take their emblems. They don't deserve to wear them!
I'm gonna burn every one of these emblems personally, <PCNAME>.
{@LinkCreature:33#12#Blood Guard lancers} and {@LinkCreature:33#62#champions} are mocking us with those emblems. Are you gonna put up with that?
